verses.roman:
sāta vatsarera śiśu, nāhi adhyayana
aiche śloka kare,--lokera camatkāra mana

synonyms: sāta vatsarera—seven years old; śiśu—the boy; nāhi adhyayana—without education; aiche—such; śloka—verse; kare—composes; lokera—of all the people; camatkāra—struck with wonder; mana—mind.
translation: Although the boy was only seven years old and still had no education, he composed such a nice verse. Everyone was struck with wonder.
